Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires search engines inform users when showing information which was generated using artificial intelligence
Summary: Requires search engines inform users when showing information which was generated using artificial intelligence.
LawCode: Add ยง399-ss, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring search engines inform users when showing information which was generated using artificial intelligence
